description: The button that appears after a selection zoom, allowing the user to reset zoom.

children.name: relativeTo
children.description: What frame the button placement should be related to. Can be either plotBox or spacingBox.

children.name: theme
children.description: A collection of attributes for the button. The object takes SVG attributes like fill, stroke, stroke-width or r, the border radius. The theme also supports style, a collection of CSS properties for the text. Equivalent attributes for the hover state are given in theme.states.hover.
